0.code:
% Facts about family members
male(john).
female(jane).
parent(john, mike).
parent(jane, mike).

% Query to test
%? parent(john, Who).

1.code:
% Define some basic math facts
sum(X, Y, Z) :- Z is X + Y.
product(X, Y, Z) :- Z is X * Y.

% Queries to test
%? sum(10, 5, What).
%? product(6, 7, What).

2.code:
% Facts about lists
member(X, [X|_]).
member(X, [_|T]) :- member(X, T).

% Queries to test
%? member(3, [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]).
%? member(X, [a, b, c, d]).
